page.title: 10Leisure in the local area
page.content: We asked people living in our area what they thought of the sports facilities available in the area.There is an 18 hole golf course,2 driving ranges,1 putting green,2 swimming pools ,tennis courts,boxing,weight training, badmington,squash,judo and table tennis available.The opinions varied from poor to excellent,with most people thinking they were adequate.A few of those asked traveled out of the area to sporting activities.The people who answered our questionnaire,used their leisure time in a number of different ways.Most of them listened to the radio and all watched TV at some time.Gardening was a very popular activity throughout the survey,and DIY was also popular.Fishing ,shooting,sailing,motoring,cycling and walking were all minority.The most unusual hobby was tiddly-winks,and more women did knitting than sewing.
